Catppuccin Mocha Theme üåô

Your dotfiles use the Catppuccin Mocha theme consistently across all tools:

üé® Theme Configuration by Tool

Tool Config File Theme Setting
Starship (prompt) starship/.config/starship.toml palette = "catppuccin_mocha"
Neovim nvim/.config/nvim/init.lua catppuccin/nvim plugin
Tmux tmux/.tmux/plugins/tmux/catppuccin_options_tmux.conf @catppuccin_flavor "mocha"
Bat (syntax) bat/.config/bat/config --theme="Catppuccin Mocha"
Delta (git diff) delta/.config/delta/delta.gitconfig features = catppuccin-mocha
GitUI gitui/.config/gitui/theme.ron Catppuccin Mocha colors
Zsh (syntax) zsh/.zshrc catppuccin_mocha-zsh-syntax-highlighting.zsh

üé® Catppuccin Mocha Color Palette

Base Colors:
  rosewater: #f5e0dc    flamingo: #f2cdcd
  pink:      #f5c2e7    mauve:    #cba6f7
  red:       #f38ba8    maroon:   #eba0ac
  peach:     #fab387    yellow:   #f9e2af
  green:     #a6e3a1    teal:     #94e2d5
  sky:       #89dceb    sapphire: #74c7ec
  blue:      #89b4fa    lavender: #b4befe

Text & Overlays:
  text:      #cdd6f4    subtext1: #bac2de
  subtext0:  #a6adc8    overlay2: #9399b2
  overlay1:  #7f849c    overlay0: #6c7086

Surfaces:
  surface2:  #585b70    surface1: #45475a
  surface0:  #313244    base:     #1e1e2e
  mantle:    #181825    crust:    #11111b

üìÅ Available Theme Files

  • Bat themes: bat/.config/bat/themes/Catppuccin*.tmTheme (4 variants)
  • Delta theme: delta/.config/delta/themes/catppuccin.gitconfig
  • GitUI themes: gitui/.config/gitui/catppuccin-*.ron (4 variants)

All tools are configured for the Mocha variant (dark, warm theme). Other variants available: Latte (light), Frapp√©, Macchiato.
